content:
Funding opportunity in robotic technologies.
The COVID-19 call, by DIH-HERO together with Robotics in Healthcare European network, is targeted at supporting robotic technologies and solutions in the later stages of development that can be deployed in the healthcare sector quickly, to support healthcare professionals in the fight against COVID-19, satisfying a current clinical demand or need. (the applicant should be aimed to finalise the first demonstrator within 4 weeks, while the whole project must be completed preferably within 8 weeks).
Call duration: 10th of April 2020 â€“ 17th of April 2020

https://dih-hero.eu/supporting-professionals-in-the-fight-against-covid-19/

The Swiss federal councils launches a special national research program (NRP) on COVID-19. The program has a total fund of CHF 20 for 2 years.

Official announcement: French | German | Italian
